alert.note: Alert for Ness (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ness and Hodgeman Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Utica to 11 miles southwest of Ness City to 10 miles north of Howell. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Arnold around 430 PM CDT. Ransom around 445 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Jetmore, Bazine and Hanston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern Kansas.
